title: Verify 'Subscribe' button functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the 'Subscribe' button leads to the subscription page or modal.
steps: 1. Locate the 'Subscribe' button on the top navigation bar. 2. Click on the 'Subscribe' button.
expected_result: User is redirected to the subscription page or a subscription modal appears.

title: Verify 'Discord' button functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the 'Discord' button opens the Discord Community modal.
steps: 1. Locate the 'Discord' button on the top navigation bar. 2. Click on the 'Discord' button.
expected_result: A modal appears with information about joining the Discord Community.

title: Verify 'Archive' button functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the 'Archive' button redirects to the archive page.
steps: 1. Locate the 'Archive' button on the top navigation bar. 2. Click on the 'Archive' button.
expected_result: User is redirected to the archive page.

title: Verify 'Star' button functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the 'Star' button marks the page as a favorite or opens a relevant feature.
steps: 1. Locate the 'Star' button on the top navigation bar. 2. Click on the 'Star' button.
expected_result: The page is marked as a favorite or a relevant feature is activated.

title: Verify 'Light' button functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the 'Light' button toggles the webpage theme between light and dark mode.
steps: 1. Locate the 'Light' button on the top navigation bar. 2. Click on the 'Light' button.
expected_result: The webpage theme toggles between light and dark mode.

title: Verify search functionality
description: Ensure that the search bar allows users to search for articles.
steps: 1. Locate the search bar below the navigation buttons. 2. Enter a search term (e.g., 'AI'). 3. Press Enter or click the search icon.
expected_result: Search results related to the search term are displayed.

title: Verify article link functionality
description: Ensure that clicking on the 'Original Article' link opens the original article.
steps: 1. Locate the 'Original Article' link in the article summary section. 2. Click on the 'Original Article' link.
expected_result: User is redirected to the original article's webpage.

title: Verify 'HN Discussion' link functionality
description: Ensure that clicking on the 'HN Discussion' link opens the Hacker News discussion.
steps: 1. Locate the 'HN Discussion' link in the article summary section. 2. Click on the 'HN Discussion' link.
expected_result: User is redirected to the Hacker News discussion page.

title: Verify 'Audio' button functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the 'Audio' button plays the audio version of the article.
steps: 1. Locate the 'Audio' button in the article section. 2. Click on the 'Audio' button.
expected_result: The audio version of the article starts playing.

title: Verify 'NotebookLM' button functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the 'NotebookLM' button opens the notebook feature.
steps: 1. Locate the 'NotebookLM' button in the article section. 2. Click on the 'NotebookLM' button.

title: Verify visual layout consistency
description: Ensure that the webpage layout is consistent and visually appealing across different screen sizes.
steps: 1. Open the webpage on different devices (desktop, tablet, mobile). 2. Observe the layout and visual elements.
expected_result: The layout is consistent and visually appealing across all devices.

title: Verify error handling for invalid search input
description: Ensure that the search functionality handles invalid input gracefully.
steps: 1. Locate the search bar. 2. Enter an invalid search term (e.g., '!@#$%^&*'). 3. Press Enter or click the search icon.
expected_result: An appropriate error message is displayed, and no results are shown.
